title: (x) Your Party Is Our Business - Artistik {Mike Y}
content:
what is the id of this font (your party…) thank you very much in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [File](http://web.archive.org/web/20060524213413/http:/typophile.com/files/drupal_51) | 49.53 KB |
author: contohabc

comments.content: Look at the 4 different ‘s’ and 2 different ‘r’ and ‘u’: my guess is handdrawn.

The Your Party is Our Business font is called [Artistik](http://web.archive.org/web/20060524213413/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/artistik/), and it is an old Art Nouveau era typeface, designed by Bauer & Co & H. Berthold, in Stuttgart. & Berlin, respectively (See Petzendorfer’s “Treasury of Art Nouveau Alphabets” from Dover Books)

- Mike Yanega
